changelog.change_log:
Compete against other players from around the world to get the top score on every song with Blocks dropping all around you!

We've packed a whole bunch into this update:
- More weapons
- More blocks
- More songs
- more powerups
- more vr blast

Lock N' Load!

- Fixed an exploitable bug that caused levels to not trigger the defeat sequence in some cases. As we roll out this fix we will also purge the leaderboards from any suspicious scores.

- Based on player feedback we improved Shielder Block animations to better communicate their state.

- Fixed a bug that caused Level 2 Shielded Block to not change appearance when taking damage
Fixed a critical bug that could cause a run to be unplayable

- Local Leaderboard - compete against friends and family or track your progress using the Local Leaderboard tab! A highly requested new feature that only tracks scores made on your device

- Shielder Block behavior changes - we felt that the Shielder Blocks were not matching up to their gameplay potential so instead of just shooting them in the center they now toggle their shields every couple of seconds and you have to shoot them when the shield is down

- Firebird is now Bouncer - changed Block model, animations, and sound effects to better fit in with the rest of the game

- Colorblind Mode - can now be toggled in the settings to increase the visibility of in-game colors to better accommodate people with color blindness

- Performance optimization 
- Various graphic tweaks
- Squashed some bugs
